dr-aditya.name: Dr. Aditya
dr-aditya.about: Dr. Aditya is an MDS in Orthodontics and Dentofacial Orthopedics with 1 year of clinical experience.
designation: MDS (Orthodontics and Dentofacial Orthopedics)
experience: 1 year

dr-pradnya-maen.name: Dr. Pradnya Maen
dr-pradnya-maen.about: Dr. Rachana Hivarkar is a skilled dental and cosmetic care provider with comprehensive experience in dentistry and aesthetic procedures.
designation: Bachelor of Dental Surgery - Dr. DY Patil Dental College, Pimpri.
Post Graduation Diploma in clinical cosmetology, Advanced Institute of Cosmetic Medicine and surgery, Pune.
Diploma in Microblading and micropigmentation, Advanced Institute of Cosmetic Medicine and surgery Pune.
Diploma in BB glow, Advanced Institute of Cosmetic Medicine and surgery Pune.
experience: 2019-2022 Associate dentist at Ssai Smile orthodontics, Chakan.
2023-2024 Owner at Hivarkar Dental Care, Chakan.
Associate Cosmetologist at Absolute clinic. Bhosari.
services: Dental Procedures: Root canals, extractions, fillings, crowns, bridges, veneers, implants, etc.
Restorative Dentistry: Fillings, crowns, bridges, dentures
Preventive Dentistry: Cleanings, fluoride treatments, sealants, patient education
Digital Dentistry: Digital radiography, CAD/CAM systems, intraoral scanners
Pediatric Dentistry: Care for children's teeth
X-ray Technology: Operating and interpreting X-rays

dr-neel.name: Dr. Neel
dr-neel.about: Dr. Neel Doshi is an accomplished endodontist with academic and clinical expertise, having trained nationally and internationally.
designation: BDS
MDS
experience: BDS completed 2021
MDS in Conservative Dentistry & Endodontics completed 2025
Ex-Lab Instructor - Athabasca University, Canada
Associate Fellow - World Clinical Laser Institute
Certified Implantologist - Nobel Biocare
Pursuing Fellowship in Advanced Microendodontics (D.Y. Patil, Navi Mumbai under Dr. Vivek Hegde)
services: Open apex management, regenerative & surgical endodontics
